title: Geolocation Dictionary Application
description: A dictionary application where you are able to find a definition to a specific word and also see where you are searching from.
technologies: HTML, Skeleton CSS, JavaScript, and Github Pages.

title: Pokedex
description: Shows all Pokemon with the help of the PokeAPI and each Pokemon has a different page that can be reached through clicking on the Pokemon on the home page.

title: The Easy Allies' Hall of Greats
alt: The Easy Allies' Hall of Greats
description: A showcase of Easy Allies's Hall of Greats, which is their Hall fo Fame for video games.
technologies: React, Node.Js, Express, MongoDB, React Bootstrap, Material UI

title: Budget Tracker
description: Website to track your expenses in a chart that changes through the expenses and income you put into the application.
technologies: Manifest, Node.Js, Service Worker, Mongoose, and Heroku.
